Body: I have a Samsung Galaxy J1, and something I didn't notice when I was at the store is it only has 4gb of device storage space, of which 1.79gb are locked for system memory, so I am left with little room for apps. Some I can install and then move to the Sd card but I was wondering if there is a way to make it so the apps auto install of the sd card, and possibly how to force some apps to move into the sd card? [WhatsApp for example can't be moved but I'd preffer it was in the card:/ ]Also, is there a way to know in advance if the app will be moveable into the sdcard? Ex: Before installing Whatsapp could I have know it couldn't be moved?I thank in advance for any response :)
Title: Auto-Install Apps on the Sd Card? Samsung Galaxy J1

history.Text: I have a Samsung Galaxy J1, and something I didn't notice when I was at the store is it only has 4gb of device storage space, of which 1.79gb are locked for system memory, so I am left with little room for apps, some I can install and then move to the Sd card but I was wondering if there is a way to make it so the apps auto install of the sd card, and possibly how to force some apps to move into the sd card [WhatsApp for example can't be moved but I'd preffer it was in the card:/ ]I thank in advance for any response :)
Auto-Install Apps on the Sd Card? Samsung Galaxy J1

1. I have a Samsung Galaxy J1, and something I didn't notice when I was at the store is it only has 4gb of device storage space, of which 1.79gb are locked for system memory, so I am left with little room for apps, some I can install and then move to the Sd card but I was wondering if there is a way to make it so the apps auto install of the sd card, and possibly how to force some apps to move into the sd card [WhatsApp for example can't be moved but I'd preffer it was in the card:/ ]P.S.: 2. Is there a way to know in advance if the app will be moveable into the sdcard? Ex: Before installing Whatsapp could I have know it couldn't be moved?I thank in advance for any response :)
